sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.USERCENTER, T.YAOCJHXH, T.CHEXMC, to_char(T.ZONGCC) ZONGCC, T.SHIFWC FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJHZB T WHERE T.USERCENTER = #UC#
t.YAOCJHXH = #DATE#
ORDER BY T.SHIFWC ,t.YAOCJHXH desc

SELECT T.CHEX, C.CHEXMC, TO_CHAR(T.ZONGCC) ZONGCC FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_CHELMX T JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CHEX where biaos='1') C ON C.CHEXBH = T.CHEX WHERE T.USERCENTER = #UC# AND T.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH#

SELECT MX.ID, MX.YAOCJHXH, MX.USERCENTER, MX.YAOCJHH, MX.YUNSLX, MX.JIHCX, CX.CHEXBH , TO_CHAR(MX.DAOCSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') DAOCSJ, TO_CHAR(MX.FAYSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') FAYSJ, MX.YAOCZT, MX.CELBH, MX.SHIFMZ, Y.YUNSSBM FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX MX JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CHEX where biaos='1') CX ON CX.CHEXBH = MX.JIHCX LEFT JOIN ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJH Y ON MX.YAOCJHH = Y.YAOCJHH WHERE MX.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# ORDER BY MX.FAYSJ

SELECT MX.ID, MX.YAOCJHXH, MX.USERCENTER, MX.YAOCJHH, MX.YUNSLX, MX.JIHCX, CX.CHEXBH , TO_CHAR(MX.DAOCSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') DAOCSJ, TO_CHAR(MX.FAYSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') FAYSJ, MX.YAOCZT, MX.CELBH, case MX.SHIFMZ when '1' then '满载' else '未满' end SHIFMZ, Y.YUNSSBM FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX MX JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CHEX where biaos='1') CX ON CX.CHEXBH = MX.JIHCX LEFT JOIN ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJH Y ON MX.YAOCJHH = Y.YAOCJHH WHERE MX.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# ORDER BY MX.FAYSJ

SELECT MX.ID, MX.YAOCJHXH, MX.USERCENTER, MX.YAOCJHH, MX.YUNSLX, MX.JIHCX, CX.CHEXMC , TO_CHAR(MX.DAOCSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') DAOCSJ, TO_CHAR(MX.FAYSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') FAYSJ, MX.YAOCZT, MX.CELBH, '' GCBH, '' GONGSMC FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX MX JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CHEX where biaos='1') CX ON CX.CHEXBH = MX.JIHCX WHERE MX.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# AND MX.YAOCZT = '1' AND YAOCJHH IS NULL

SELECT SB.YUNSSBM,GS.GONGSMC, SB.SHENBSJ, SB.CHEX, CX.CHEXMC, to_char(nvl((SB.SHUL - TT.ZONGCC),0)) SHUL FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_CHELSB SB JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CHEX where biaos='1') CX ON CX.CHEXBH = SB.CHEX JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGYS where biaos='1') GS ON GS.GCBH = SB.YUNSSBM AND GS.leix='3' AND GS.USERCENTER = #UC#
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT JH.YUNSSBM, SUM(JH.ZONGCC) ZONGCC FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJH JH WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT MX.YAOCJHH FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX MX WHERE MX.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# GROUP BY MX.YAOCJHH) T WHERE T.YAOCJHH = JH.YAOCJHH) GROUP BY JH.YUNSSBM) TT ON TT.YUNSSBM = SB.YUNSSBM
WHERE SB.USERCENTER = #UC# AND SB.SHENBSJ = TO_DATE(#YAOCJHXH#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT KG.KEHBH, KG.CHENGYSBH FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_KEH_CHENGPK KG WHERE KG.USERCENTER = #UC#

SELECT MX.ID, MX.YAOCJHXH, MX.USERCENTER, MX.YAOCJHH, MX.YUNSLX, MX.JIHCX, TO_CHAR(MX.DAOCSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') DAOCSJ, TO_CHAR(MX.FAYSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') FAYSJ, MX.YAOCZT, MX.CELBH, CL.CELMC, MX.SHIFMZ FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX MX JOIN ${dbSchemal3}CKX_PEIZCL CL ON CL.CELBH = MX.CELBH JOIN ${dbSchemal3}CKX_KEH_CHENGPK GS ON GS.YUNSLXBH = MX.YUNSLX AND GS.CHENGYSBH = #GCBH# AND GS.USERCENTER = #UC# WHERE MX.YAOCZT = '1' AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJH H WHERE H.YAOCJHH = MX.YAOCJHH AND H.USERCENTER=#UC#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX MX SET MX.YAOCJHH = #YAOCJHH# WHERE MX.ID=#ID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T.YAOCJHH FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX T WHERE USERCENTER=#usercenter# AND ID=#id#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJH (YAOCJHH, USERCENTER, SHIFQR, YUNSSBM, ZONGCC, KAISSJ, JIESSJ, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME) VALUES (#YAOCJHH#, #USERCENTER#, #SHIFQR#, #YUNSSBM#, #ZONGCC#, TO_DATE( #KAISSJ#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE( #JIESSJ#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #CREATOR#, #CREATE_TIME#)

INSERT INTO ${dbSchemal2}FJ_PEIZJH (YAOCMXH, PEIZDH, USERCENTER, DAOCSJ, YUNSSBM, JIHCX, YUNSLX, CANGKBH, JIHZT, FAYSJ, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME) SELECT X.ID, #PEIZDH# PEIZDH, X.USERCENTER, X.DAOCSJ, #YUNSSBM# YUNSSBM, X.JIHCX, YUNSLX, X.CANGKBH, #JIHZT# JIHZT, X.FAYSJ, #CREATOR# CREATOR, SYSDATE CREATE_TIME FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX X WHERE X.ID=#ID#

INSERT INTO ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOHLMX (YAOHLBH, PEIZDH, YAOCMXH, BAOZDM, LINGJMC, LINGJSL, FAYSJ, KEHBM, JIAOFSJ, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, USERCENTER ) SELECT C.YAOHLH, #PEIZDH# PEIZDH, #ID# YAOCMXH, C.BAOZXH, LJ.ZHONGWMC, C.YAOHSL, C.FAYSJ, C.KEH, C.JIAOFJ, #CREATOR# CREATOR , SYSDATE CREATE_TIME, C.USERCENTER FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_YAONBHL C JOIN ${dbSchemal2}FJ_JIHYHLMX MX ON MX.YAOHLBH = C.YAOHLH AND MX.ID = #ID# JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_LINGJ where biaos='1') LJ ON LJ.LINGJBH = C.LINGJBH AND LJ.USERCENTER= C.USERCENTER WHERE C.USERCENTER=#UC#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.YUNSSBM, T1.CHEX, CX.CHEXMC, to_char(NVL((T1.SHUL - nvl(T2.SHUL,0)),0)) SHUL FROM (SELECT SB.CHEX, SB.SHUL, SB.YUNSSBM FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_CHELSB SB WHERE SB.USERCENTER = #UC# AND SB.YUNSSBM = #YUNSSBM# AND SB.SHENBSJ = TO_DATE(#YAOCJHXH#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) T1 JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CHEX where biaos='1') CX ON CX.CHEXBH = T1. CHEX LEFT JOIN (SELECT PE.YUNSSBM, PE.JIHCX, NVL(COUNT(1), 0) SHUL FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_PEIZJH PE JOIN ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX MX ON MX.ID = PE.YAOCMXH WHERE MX.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# AND PE.YUNSSBM = #YUNSSBM# GROUP BY PE.YUNSSBM, PE.JIHCX) T2 ON T1.YUNSSBM = T2.YUNSSBM AND T1.CHEX = T2.JIHCX

SELECT TO_CHAR((B.ZONGCC - C.ZONGCC)) ZONGCC FROM (SELECT B.ZONGCC FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJHZB B WHERE B.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND B.USERCENTER = #UC#) B, (SELECT COUNT(JH.ZONGCC) ZONGCC FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJH JH WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX X WHERE X.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND X.USERCENTER = #UC#)) C
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJHZB ZB SET ZB.SHIFWC = '1' WHERE ZB.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND ZB.USERCENTER = #UC#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOHLMX MX WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX YAO WHERE YAO.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND YAO.USERCENTER = #UC# AND MX.YAOCMXH = YAO.ID)
DELETE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_PEIZJH JH WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX YAO WHERE YAO.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND YAO.USERCENTER = #UC# AND JH.YAOCMXH = YAO.ID)
DELETE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJH JH WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX YAO WHERE YAO.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND YAO.USERCENTER = #UC# AND JH.YAOCJHH = YAO.YAOCJHH)
UPDATE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX JH SET JH.YAOCJHH = NULL WHERE JH.USERCENTER = #UC# AND JH.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH#

SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJH H WHERE H.USERCENTER = #UC# AND H.YAOCJHH = X.YAOCJHH)) )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_JIHYHLMX M WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX X WHERE M.ID = X.ID AND X.USERCENTER = #UC# AND X.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJH H WHERE H.USERCENTER = #UC# AND H.YAOCJHH = X.YAOCJHH))
DELETE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX X WHERE X.USERCENTER = #UC# AND X.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJH H WHERE H.USERCENTER = #UC# AND H.YAOCJHH = X.YAOCJHH )

sqlMap.select: SELECT MX.JIHCX, CX.CHEXMC, TO_CHAR(COUNT(1)) SL FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX MX JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CHEX where biaos='1') CX ON CX.CHEXBH = MX.JIHCX WHERE MX.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# GROUP BY MX.JIHCX, CX.CHEXMC

select gcbh,gongsmc from (select gcbh,gongsmc from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGYS where leix='3' and usercenter=#usercenter# and biaos='1' ) g inner join ( select t.yunslxbh,t.chengysbh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_keh_chengpk t where usercenter=#usercenter#) c on g.gcbh = c.chengysbh where yunslxbh in ($yunslxbhs$) group by gcbh,gongsmc order by gcbh
select t.yunslx from ${dbSchemal2}fj_yaocmx t where t.yaocjhxh=#yaocjhxh# and t.usercenter=#usercenter# group by t.yunslx

SELECT SB.USERCENTER, SB.YUNSSBM, SB.CHEX,CG.GONGSMC, TO_CHAR(SB.SHUL) SHUL FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_CHELSB SB JOIN ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CHEX_YUNSS YS ON YS.YUNSSBH = SB.YUNSSBM AND YS.USERCENTER =#UC# JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGYS where biaos='1') CG ON YS.YUNSSBH=CG.GCBH WHERE SB.USERCENTER = #UC# AND SB.SHENBSJ LIKE TO_DATE(#SHENBSJ#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and SB.YUNSSBM=#YUNSSBH# UNION SELECT YS.USERCENTER, YS.YUNSSBH, YS.CHEXBH, CG.GONGSMC, '0' SHUL FROM ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CHEX_YUNSS YS JOIN (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGYS where biaos='1') CG ON YS.YUNSSBH=CG.GCBH WHERE YS.USERCENTER =#UC# AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_CHELSB S WHERE S.USERCENTER = YS.USERCENTER AND S.YUNSSBM = YS.YUNSSBH AND S.CHEX = YS.CHEXBH AND S.USERCENTER =#UC# AND S.SHENBSJ LIKE TO_DATE(#SHENBSJ#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) and YS.YUNSSBH=#YUNSSBH#

SELECT GYS.GCBH, CPK.YUNSLXBH FROM (select * from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGYS where biaos='1') GYS inner JOIN ${dbSchemal3}CKX_KEH_CHENGPK CPK ON CPK.CHENGYSBH = GYS.GCBH AND CPK.USERCENTER = #UC# WHERE GYS.USERCENTER = #UC# AND GYS.LEIX = '3' GROUP BY GYS.GCBH, CPK.YUNSLXBH ORDER BY GYS.GCBH, CPK.YUNSLXBH
sqlMap.delete: DELETE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX MX WHERE MX.USERCENTER = #UC# AND MX.ID in ($IDs$)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${dbSchemal4}CK_YAONBHL YAO SET YAO.SUODPZ = '0' WHERE YAO.USERCENTER = #UC# AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_JIHYHLMX MX WHERE MX.ID in ($IDs$) AND MX.YAOHLBH = YAO.YAOHLH)

UPDATE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_CHELMX MX SET MX.ZONGCC = MX.ZONGCC - (select count(*) from ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX M where id in ($IDs$) AND M.JIHCX=#CHEX#) WHERE MX.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# AND MX.CHEX = #CHEX#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MX.ZONGCC FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_CHELMX MX WHERE MX.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# AND MX.CHEX = #CHEX#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_CHELMX MX WHERE MX.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# AND MX.CHEX = #CHEX#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJHZB ZB SET ZB.ZONGCC = ZB.ZONGCC - (select count(*) from ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX M where id in ($IDs$)) WHERE ZB.USERCENTER = #UC# AND ZB.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH#
sqlMap.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(ZB.ZONGCC - TMP.ZCC) ZCC FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCJHZB ZB JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) ZCC, #UC# USERCENTER, #YAOCJHXH# YAOCJHXH FROM ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX MX WHERE MX.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH# AND MX.USERCENTER = #UC# AND MX.YAOCJHH IS NOT NULL) TMP ON ZB.USERCENTER = TMP.USERCENTER AND ZB.YAOCJHXH = TMP.YAOCJHXH WHERE ZB.USERCENTER = #UC# AND ZB.YAOCJHXH = #YAOCJHXH#

select COUNT(1) from ${dbSchemal2}FJ_PEIZJH pjh inner join ${dbSchemal2}FJ_YAOCMX ycmx on pjh.yaocmxh = ycmx.id and ycmx.yaocjhxh = #YAOCJHXH# and ycmx.usercenter = #UC# where pjh.jihzt ='1' or pjh.jihzt ='2'
